author: cnbc.com
title: RigNet Announces Fourth Quarter and Full-Year 2017 Earnings Release Date and Conference Call Information
text:
HOUSTON, March 01, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- RigNet, Inc. (NASDAQ:RNET) today announced that it will release its fourth quarter and full-year 2017 earnings results after the NASDAQ Exchange closes Tuesday, March 6, 2018. This release will be followed by a conference call for investors, Wednesday, March 7, 2018, at 11:00 a.m. Eastern Time (10:00 a.m. CT) to discuss RigNet's fourth quarter 2017 results. Hosting the call will be Steven Pickett, Chief Executive Officer and President.
The call may be accessed live over the telephone by dialing +1 (877) 845-0777, or for international callers, +1 (760) 298-5090. Interested parties may also listen to a simultaneous webcast of the conference call by logging onto RigNet's website at www.rig.net in the Investors â€” Webcasts and Presentation section. A replay of the conference call will also be available for approximately 30 days following the call.
About RigNet
RigNet (NASDAQ:RNET) is a global technology company that provides customized communications services, applications and cybersecurity solutions enhancing customer decision making and business performance. RigNet is headquartered in Houston, Texas with operations around the world.
For more information on RigNet, please visit www.rig.net . RigNet is a registered trademark of RigNet, Inc.
